title: High Private Debt from Other Creditors
description: In 2023, South Africa had a private debt of $750 million from other creditors, marking one of the highest values globally.

title: Efficient Tax Meetings
description: In 2020, South African firms required only one meeting with tax officials on average, showcasing one of the most efficient tax processes worldwide.

title: Late Start in Lower Secondary Education
description: South Africa's lower secondary school starting age is 14 years as of 2023, one of the latest globally, potentially impacting early educational development.

title: High Male Unemployment with Basic Education
description: In 2023, 36.179% of the male labor force with basic education was unemployed, one of the highest rates globally, indicating challenges in job market integration.

title: Overall High Unemployment with Basic Education
description: As of 2023, 38.607% of the total labor force with basic education was unemployed, highlighting significant employment challenges in the country.
